title: About 100 Days of Cloud
tagline: Hello ALL! Welcome to 100 Days of Cloud, Where all things Cloud are discussed.

content.text1: #100DaysofCloud is inspired by Alex Kallaway's #100DaysofCode challenge. We encourage you to commit to 100 days of learning about Cloud and the various Cloud platforms and ecosystems.
content.text2: This site will be the home for cloud resources created by members in the community.

content.text1: Check out the links below for more resources.
